document.full_text: rafael nadal now has to worry about novak djokovic, who is unbeaten in 2011, in his bid to equal bjorn borg's record of six french open titles.
document.title: borg roots for nadal to join him as new rival arises
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal now has to worry about novak djokovic, who is unbeaten in 2011, in his bid to equal bjorn borg's record of six french open titles.
